page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KAY
page.content: I am 10 years old. My mum works at D.J. Security Alarms and my dad is a draughtsman. I have a brother called Andrew and he is 8. He keeps tropical fish. We also have a budgie called Buzby. On the first Saturday in May we went into Manchester on an orange and white bus. We paid 35p for my mum and 10p for me on the bus. We walked up to Debenhams and up the escalator to the top floor where my mum paid her chargecard bill. Then we went to the big cafeteria and had a drink and some chips and sandwiches. I got a new dress for my holidays then we bought some food and caught the bus home.
